00004 typedef enum event_t{
00005   UNKNOWN=0,
00006   /* network events should be in [1,20] */
00007   NETWORK_EVENT=1,
00008   NETWORK_FAIL=20,
00009   /* callEvent events should be in [21,60] */
00010   /* specific releted to call [21,40] */
00011   NEW_CALL=21,
00012   RINGING,
00013   HOLD_CALL,
00014   HELD_CALL,
00015   RELEASE_CALL,
00016   CALL_FAIL=40,
00017   AUTH_REQUIRED,
00018   REGISTER_START,
00019   REGISTER_DONE,
00020   REGISTER_FAIL=60,  
00021   /* generic signalig stuff [41,60] */
00022   /* client events should be in [61,80] */
00023   CLIENT_EXIT=61,
00024   DRIVER_READY,
00025   CLIENT_FAIL=80,
00026 } event_type;
